Description: We are undertaking a Cap raise and seek Financial Advisors to promote our Luxury focused company to their retail clients with a view to them subscribing for our Stock. Currently, we are recruiting for 3 positions: In-house Financial Advisor, Professional Introducers and BDMs.The candidate Advisor should have an existing client base, noting we may be able to provide leads via BDMs and possess Industry standard qualifications.The candidate BDM should already be working in such a role and be highly disciplined. We may be able to provide leads if required.Salary range for Financial Advisors/ Introducers is circa EUR 2000-15,000 +5% Comms or 7% Comms only for and EUR 2000-3500 +25% Comms for BDMs.Skills

Data.Job Location: New York, New York , United States
